column4: hi. i would like to install ubuntu on pc with nvidia fx 5500. i found many posts about how to make it work after i have ubuntu installed, but i cant find info about how to install ubuntu on a pc with it. the installer gets stuck. is there a way i can overcome this problem?
well... there are many ways to accomplish this, but it would be a good idea to determine what is causing the problem.
well...for the installation itself it uses the open drivers (afaik)
well... i guess you could use other drivers via kernel parameters ..hm
